trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that creates an animation that resembles a spring oscillating back and forth until it comes to rest.
trans-unit.target: 表示緩動函式，這個函式會建立類似於彈簧來回振動直到停止的動畫。

trans-unit.source: You can control when in the "spring" behavior occurs in an animation by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制"spring"中發生問題時的動畫藉由指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrates the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: 下圖示範不同的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>，其中*f*(*t*) 表示的動畫進度和*t*代表時間。

trans-unit.source: ![ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 ElasticEase。](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 ElasticEase。")

trans-unit.source: You can specify how many times the animation oscillates back and forth using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations%2A> property and how tight the springiness of the oscillations are using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定動畫 oscillates 使用來回次數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations%2A>屬性以及如何緊密使用振動的 springiness<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Because this animation causes values to oscillate back and forth, the animation might interpolate into negative numbers unexpectedly.
trans-unit.target: 這個動畫會造成 oscillate 來回的值，因為動畫可能會進行插補到負數意外。

trans-unit.source: This can cause errors when animating properties that do not allow negative numbers.
trans-unit.target: 建立動畫的屬性不允許使用負數時，這可能會導致錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you apply this animation to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of an object (e.g. from 0 to 200 with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn>), the animation will attempt to interpolate through negative numbers for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> which will throw an error.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您將套用至這個動畫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>的物件 (例如從 0 到 200 與<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn>)，動畫會嘗試進行插補，透過的負數<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>這將會擲回錯誤。

trans-unit.source: There are several other easing functions besides <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase> which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: 有數個其他加/減速函數除了<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase>其中您可以瀏覽 使用下列的 Silverlight 範例。

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery)
trans-unit.target: [執行這個範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery)

trans-unit.source: In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用加/減速函數包含在執行階段中，您可以建立您自己自訂的加/減速函數透過繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Object Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 物件項目用法

trans-unit.source: The following example applies an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase> easing function to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> to create an animation that resembles a spring oscillating back and forth until it comes to rest.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase>easing 函式可<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>建立類似 spring，直到到達貼齊來回擺動的動畫。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 衍生類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 建立衍生類別時，您必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: 動畫類別間接繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>建構自訂動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a typical implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範典型實作<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的標準化時間 (進度)。

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn" /> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: 提供 easing 函式的邏輯部分，您可將其覆寫以產生自訂 easing 函式的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn" /> 模式。

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: 表示已轉換進度的雙精度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法來轉換控制的動畫的速度的標準化的時間<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn>案例<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseOut> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseInOut> cases.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要指定您加/減速函數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn>因為大小寫的實作<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>方法轉換`normalizedTime`如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseOut>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseInOut>案例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of times the target slides back and forth over the animation destination.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定到達動畫目的期間，目標來回滑動的次數。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the target slides back and forth over the animation destination.
trans-unit.target: 到達動畫目的期間，目標來回滑動的次數。

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個值必須大於或等於 0。

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 3。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: The following example applies an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase> easing function to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> to create an animation that resembles a spring oscillating back and forth until it comes to rest.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase>easing 函式可<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>建立類似 spring，直到到達貼齊來回擺動的動畫。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Oscillations" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the stiffness of the spring.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定彈簧的僵硬度。

trans-unit.source: The smaller the Springiness value is, the stiffer the spring and the faster the elasticity decreases in intensity over each oscillation.
trans-unit.target: Springiness 值越小，彈簧就越僵硬，而且每次振動的彈性強度也會更快增加。

trans-unit.source: A positive number that specifies the stiffness of the spring.
trans-unit.target: 指定彈簧硬度的正數。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 3.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 3。

trans-unit.source: The smaller the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness%2A> value is, the stiffer the spring and the faster the elasticity decreases in intensity over each oscillation.
trans-unit.target: 較小<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness%2A>值 stiffer spring 以及透過每個振動濃度減小速度彈性。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram illustrates the effect of different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下圖說明的不同值的效果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness%2A>。

trans-unit.source: ![Demonstrates different Springiness values.](~/add/media/elasticease-springiness.png "Demonstrates different Springiness values.")
trans-unit.target: ![示範不同的 Springiness 值。](~/add/media/elasticease-springiness.png "示範不同的 Springiness 值。")

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: The following example applies an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase> easing function to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> to create an animation that resembles a spring oscillating back and forth until it comes to rest.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase>easing 函式可<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>建立類似 spring，直到到達貼齊來回擺動的動畫。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase.Springiness" /> 相依性屬性。
